entry.title: AymenSakouhi/proFile: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.

entry.title: omarrwafiick/Nodejs_Qraphql_GamesApi: A minimal GraphQL API built with .NET that provides simple CRUD operations for managing games. This project serves as a lightweight example of how to use GraphQL to query, add, update, and delete game entries, making it ideal for learning and experimentation.
entry.content: A minimal GraphQL API built with .NET that provides simple CRUD operations for managing games. This project serves as a lightweight example of how to use GraphQL to query, add, update, and delete game entries, making it ideal for learning and experimentation.

entry.title: steveswinsburg/steprunner: StepRunner is a lightweight tool for manually executing Gherkin-based feature files step-by-step. Ideal for exploratory testing, documentation walkthroughs, or scenarios not ready for automation.
